ingredientsNeeded: Fajita seasoning (or chili powder, cumin, paprika)
Optional toppings: lettuce, salsa, sour cream, cheese
steps: Marinate chicken (optional): Toss sliced chicken with seasoning and a bit of oil. Let sit ~10 minutes.
Cook chicken: In a skillet over medium-high heat, sauté chicken until browned (~5–6 minutes).
Add peppers & onions: Stir-fry until vegetables are tender (~5 more minutes).
Warm tortillas: In a dry pan or microwave.
Assemble: Fill tortillas with chicken mixture, add desired toppings.

ingredientsNeeded: ~1 lb chicken cutlets (or breasts pounded thin)
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Dredge chicken: Beat egg in a bowl. In another bowl, mix breadcrumbs, Parmesan, salt, pepper, and herbs. Dip chicken in egg, then coat with breadcrumb mixture.
Bake chicken: Place coated chicken on a baking sheet lined with foil or parchment. Bake ~15 minutes.
Add sauce & cheese: Spoon tomato sauce over each piece, top with mozzarella.
Finish baking: Bake another ~5–10 minutes until cheese melts and chicken is fully cooked.

ingredientsNeeded: 1 cup diced carrots, peas, or other veggies
steps: Sauté chicken: Heat oil in a wok or skillet; cook diced chicken until browned (~5–6 minutes). Season lightly.
Add veggies: Stir-fry carrots, peas, or other veggies until tender.
Push aside: Move chicken & veggies to one side; scramble eggs on the empty side (if using).
Add rice: Stir in cooked rice; break up clumps.
Season: Drizzle soy sauce over; stir well. Taste and adjust salt, pepper, or more soy sauce.
Serve with green onions sprinkled on top (optional).

ingredientsNeeded: 1 packet taco seasoning (or chili powder, cumin, garlic powder)
2 cups cooked rice or quinoa (optional base)
Salsa, cheese, sour cream, guacamole (optional toppings)
steps: Brown beef: In a skillet over medium heat, sauté ground beef (and onion) until no longer pink. Drain excess fat if needed.
Season: Add taco seasoning + a splash of water. Simmer a few minutes.
Assemble bowl: Layer lettuce or rice, then beef, then bell peppers, salsa, cheese, etc.

ingredientsNeeded: 1 lb beef stew meat or ground beef
2–3 cups chopped mixed vegetables (celery, peas, green beans, etc.)
steps: Sear meat: In a large pot, brown stew meat or ground beef with onion. Drain excess fat if needed.
Add liquids: Pour in broth and diced tomatoes.
Add veggies: Carrots, celery, any others.
Season: Salt, pepper, thyme, and bay leaf.
Simmer: Bring to a gentle boil, reduce heat, cover, and simmer ~45 minutes (or until stew meat is tender).
Taste and serve hot.

recipes.recipeName: Spinach and Ricotta Whole Wheat Lasagna
ingredientsNeeded: 1 jar/can tomato sauce or crushed tomatoes (~24 oz)
steps: Pre-cook noodles (if needed) or use no-boil noodles.
Mix ricotta & spinach: In a bowl, combine ricotta, spinach, optional egg, salt, pepper, and Italian herbs.
Layer: In a baking dish, spread a bit of tomato sauce. Place a layer of noodles, then ricotta-spinach mix, then sauce, then a sprinkle of mozzarella. Repeat layers until ingredients are used.
Top with sauce and remaining mozzarella + Parmesan.
Bake: Cover with foil; bake at 375°F (190°C) for ~20 minutes. Uncover and bake another 10 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbling.
